It's masterpiece. I think it second or third hentai doujinshi that I can name like that. It will be absolutely god thing, if this had happy end! Translation is bad, but besides there is very wholesome and awesome level art. I like in "brother" that he is patient and not annoying, and his good sides. But on other side I dislike him very much. Because he doesn't ask her for cumming inside. And he even take a photo but not doing plan B. I just dislike how selfish, lewd, stupid and unemotional he is. He just does what he wants. In the end we saw that she can get pregnant, that's very stupid from him's side. If she will have baby, he will die, literally. I need to mark, that girl is very cute and naive, she's not good luck with her brother. He is blackmailed her, that why I hate him. Hope everything will be okay with Ayake. But thinking straight, this is just drawing, so nevermind that is said before. It's still pure nice doujin (manga), that I will come back from time to time.
Horrible translation and font. Now as for the guy...10 months!? Damn, he is patient. I think he must set some kind of record for how long he waited.

the doujin itself is very great 10/10, about the TL, it's kinda weird to read on vertical text  instead of horizontal text, comic sans isn't that much of a problem (since people memed comic sans as worst font). anyway, thanks for translating this masterpiece

Speaking critically, the grammar is really stiff and the typesetting is all over the place. There's also a lack of punctuation, so the already strangely spaced dialogue becomes difficult to parse. The use of Comic Sans isn't a huge issue, but the general convention for font is to use something like Anime Ace or Manga Temple. I've seen much worse, and this is... mostly coherent, but it's just that Kinomoto Anzu's works are so high-tier that (I think) they need really top notch scanlation.
What's so bad about the grammar and comic sans? Seems fine to me.
Man I really can't understand shit, the beginning was okay but it just downhill from there.
